entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:02 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 1:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Fog dissipating. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating early this afternoon then sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
